## ğŸš¶ WalkWithMe â€” AR Pedestrian Navigation & Hazard Awareness  
**GitHub:** [WalkWithMe Backend](https://github.com/srijith-reddy/walkwithme-backend)  
**GitHub:** [WalkWithMe iOS Frontend](https://github.com/srijith-reddy/walkwithme-ios)

A production-grade pedestrian navigation system combining ARKit, MapKit, and on-device computer vision to support real-world walking with safety-aware routing and hazard awareness.

The stateless FastAPI backend is built around Valhalla and extends pedestrian routing with safety-, scenic-, elevation-, and context-aware ranking, trail discovery via isochrones, elevation analysis with multi-source fallbacks, and GPX export.

The iOS frontend uses RealityKit and ARKit to render world-aligned routes and camera-relative hazard overlays, with turn-by-turn HUDs, a live minimap, and graceful fallback to Apple Maps when AR is unavailable.

The architecture cleanly separates a stateful, tile-backed routing engine from a portable API layer, enabling flexible deployment and real-time AR navigation under mobile constraints.
